sections.title: Introduction
sections.content:
See Desktop environment for the main article.

Table content:
Desktop environment | Widget toolkit | Window manager | Taskbar | Terminal emulator | File manager | Calculator | Text editor | Image viewer | Media player | Document viewer | Web browser | Display manager | Wayland support
Budgie | gtk3 | budgie-desktop | budgie-desktop | gnome-terminal | nautilus | gnome-calculator | gedit | eog | totem | evince | epiphany | gdm | Ongoing
Cinnamon | gtk3 | muffin | cinnamon | gnome-terminal | nemo | gnome-calculator | xed | xviewerAUR | celluloid | xreader | Firefox | lightdm-gtk-greeter | Experimental
Deepin | gtk3 qt5-base | deepin-kwin | deepin-shell | deepin-terminal | deepin-file-manager | deepin-calculator | deepin-editor | deepin-image-viewer | deepin-movie | evince | Chromium | deepin-session-ui | Yes
EDE | fltk | pekwm | edeAUR | xterm | pcmanfm | zalcAUR | fltk-editorAUR | edeAUR | flmusicAUR | – | dillo | xorg-xdm | No
Enlightenment | efl | enlightenment | enlightenment | terminology | enlightenment | – | ecrire | ephoto | rage | – | links | xorg-xdm | Experimental
GNOME | gtk4 libadwaita | mutter | gnome-shell | gnome-console | nautilus | gnome-calculator | gnome-text-editor | eog | totem | evince | epiphany | gdm | Yes
GNOME Flashback | gtk3 | metacity | gnome-panel | gnome-terminal | nautilus | gnome-calculator | gedit | eog | totem | evince | epiphany | gdm | No
KDE Plasma | qt6-base | kwin | plasma-desktop | konsole | dolphin | kcalc | kate (also provides kwrite) | gwenview | dragon | okular | falkon or konqueror | sddm | Yes
Liri | qt5-base | greenislandAUR | liri-shell-gitAUR | liri-terminalAUR | liri-filesAUR | liri-calculatorAUR | liri-textAUR | – | – | qpdfviewAUR | liri-browser-gitAUR | sddm | Yes
LXDE GTK 2 | gtk2 | Openbox | lxpanel | lxterminal-gtk2AUR | pcmanfm | – | leafpad | gpicview | lxmusic | atril | midoriAUR | lxdm | No
LXDE GTK 3 | gtk3 | Openbox | lxpanel-gtk3 | lxterminal | pcmanfm-gtk3 | galculator | l3afpad | gpicview | lxmusic | atril | midoriAUR | lxdm-gtk3
LXQt | qt5-base | Openbox | lxqt-panel | qterminal | pcmanfm-qt | speedcrunch | featherpad | lximage-qt | smplayer | qpdfviewAUR | falkon | sddm | Partial
MATE | gtk3 | marco | mate-panel | mate-terminal | caja | mate-calc | pluma | eom | parole | atril | midoriAUR | lightdm-gtk-greeter | Partial
Pantheon | gtk3 | gala | plank wingpanel | pantheon-terminal | pantheon-files | pantheon-calculator | pantheon-code | pantheon-photos | pantheon-videos | evince | epiphany | lightdm-pantheon-greeter | Yes
Sugar | gtk3 | metacity | sugar | sugar-activity-terminal | sugar | sugar-activity-calculate | sugar-activity-write | sugar-activity-imageviewer | sugar-activity-jukebox | sugar-activity-read | sugar-activity-browse | lightdm-gtk-greeter | No
Trinity | TQt | TWin | Kicker | Konsole | Konqueror | KCalc | Kwrite Kate | Kuickshow | Kaffeine | KPDF | Konqueror | TDM | No
Xfce | gtk3 | xfwm4 | xfce4-panel | xfce4-terminal | thunar | galculator | mousepad | ristretto | parole | atril | midoriAUR | lightdm-gtk-greeter | Experimental
